Description:
Build your dream home
Looking for a great location to build your dream home on? This superb 546sqm block (approx.) in Clyde's Elliston Estate has now been released for sale.
Close to Berwick, Selandra Rise shopping centre, St Thomas Apostle Primary School, Casey Hospital, Berwick train station, Casey fields.
This is a rare opportunity to secure a titled block of land to finally build your dream home.
Contact Matthew Dewan today for an inspection.

Description:
Build your dream home here
First Home Buyers – Pay attention! If you're looking for generous block size, convenient location and to be part of a newly establish community - look no further! We are proud to present 19 Mississippi Avenue situated in the exciting Edgbrooke Estate, Clyde.
The titled block itself offers approx. 350m2 of land – plenty of space to build your ideal future home and is nestled on neat allotment. Ideally situated, the block is also close to some fantastic amenities both established and proposed. These include future proposed parks and playgrounds, BBQ's and public artworks. Established amenities nearby include Shopping on Clyde, Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, Casey Fields, Casey RACE and several local Primary and Secondary Schools.
Don't miss this opportunity to join the Edgebrooke community!
Insights: 19 Mississippi Avenue, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Size does matter
Are you looking for an AMAZING family home with plenty of extras and convenient location? One that will have your family and friends in envy when they come to visit? Look no further – we found it for you! Located in the premium Hartleigh Estate, we present to you this impressive one year old double storey residence that you will absolutely fall in love with.
Comprising of:
First Floor:
- Large decked portico entrance with double doors.
- Study/ home office for those that work from home.
- Open plan family lounge and dining area overlooking the alfresco.
- Well-appointed hostess kitchen - complete with large walk in pantry, island bench top with breakfast bar, double under mount sink, 40mm waterfall stone benchtops and quality Technika appliances including 900mm oven, dishwasher and built in microwave with trim kit.
- 2nd living area / theater room.
- Powder room for guests.
- Fantastic decked entertainers alfresco with fan – perfect for entertaining a large crowd.
- Double remote garage with internal access to the home.
Second Floor:
- HUGE Master suite including: private balcony, separate toilet, large WIR and ensuite with double vanities and oversized shower.
- Three more large bedrooms all built in robes and one with a walk in robe.
- 3rd lounge / retreat to relax.
- Family bathroom and separate toilet.
Extras include:
Zoned refrigerated cooling and ducted heating throughout, double glazed windows and doors, downlights and plantation shutters throughout most of the house, quality carpet and underlay, alarm system (with back to base monitoring available with ADT), many feature walls, shower niches to en-suite and family bathroom, beautiful exposed aggregate driveway, solar heated hot water – THE LIST GOES ON!
On top of all the beautiful living space, contemporary design & street appeal this home offers, you'll also love all the abundance of facilities at your fingertips. Hartleigh is situated in the heart of the fastest growing suburb of Clyde and is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. There are amazing parks and open space to enjoy making family time a breeze plus there is easy access to Shopping on Clyde, schools such as Clyde Primary, sports and recreation facilities.
To find the property, please go East down Pattersons Road, Clyde and take the 2nd turn to your right at the traffic lights down Hartleigh Street. Map attached in photos. Please feel free to call either agent if you can't find the property.
Insights: 13 Hartleigh Street, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

It offers:
• 3 Bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 toilets
• Open plan kitchen/Family/Dining
• Stainless steel appliances/ Range hood

• Single lock up garage
Be quick, don't miss the chance, call us today for more info!!!!!!!

Description:
All the Hard Work is DONE!
At this price point, you'll need to be quick to snap up this contemporary 3 bedroom home! Situated in the popular Pasadena Estate, close to schools, shops, Casey Fields Sporting Complex and so much more, this a perfect home for all first home buyers or a fantastic investment property for the astute investor.
Inside you are greeted with neutral colours, floating timber laminate flooring and lots of natural light which instils confidence that you are buying a home that has been loved and looked after. The master bedroom has a full ensuite and WIR, whilst the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms both have BIRs. The gorgeous kitchen is complemented by stone bench tops, glass splash back, S/S appliances, dishwasher and a double pantry for the MasterChef's storage.
Overlooking the kitchen is the meals area and family room, which flows out the double sliding doors to the decked entertainment area that also has a BBQ area to enjoy the family events. Extras in this home are internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, remote controlled garage roller door, low maintenance garden, dishwasher, tiled shower base and so much more.
Located extremely close to all the tremendous surrounding amenities, all you would need to do is move in, relax and put your feet up because all the hard work is done!
All information contained therein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.
Insights: 3 Trickett Street, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
A rare opportunity to buy 612sqm block
This prime 612sqm block of land is ready for you to build your dream home.
Completely sold out, Belmond on Clyde is a sanctuary for those looking to escape the hustle and bustle of the everyday. Peaceful streets, a picturesque central park, 3.7 hectares of open space, all nestled amongst rolling hills.
Located in the fast growing suburb of Clyde and moments from bustling Cranbourne and Berwick. Residents will enjoy the benefits of living in a select community amongst rolling hills, lush parks and open spaces, plus easy access to shopping, schools, sports and recreation facilities. It provides the perfect balance of tranquility without the isolation. 60 minutes travel time from Melbourne CBD and 5 minutes from the town centre of Cranbourne – everything is in reach. Belmond on Clyde will be the future heart of Casey and set the standard in modern living.
Insights: 9 Highclere Drive, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
UNIQUE 3 ACRES OF PRIME UGB LIFESTYLE PROPERTY! + BUSINESS! + RENTAL INCOME!
* SITUATED WITHIN UGB, PERFECT FOR FUTURE DEVELOPMENT (STCA)
* MULTI AWARD WINNING, CATS ONLY BOARDING CATTERY BUSINESS -$100,000 P/A (APPROX) EASILY RUN BY A HUSBAND AND WIFE TEAM.
* 1 BEDROOM FULLY SELF CONTAINED 8 SQ UNIT-$10,800 NET ANNUAL RENTAL.
A superb family lifestyle awaits with this amazing 3.14 acres (approx.) family property... the Ultimate Semi-rural escape without compromising on convenience
Positioned in the sought after acreage area of Clyde, 45 mins from Melbourne on route to Phillip Island, you will find this beautiful lifestyle property set on a little over 3 acres. Being situated within the UGB, perfect for future development, and also comes with a fully operational business that offers a great return, making this property the perfect WIWO freehold investment.
With various features such as;
- Zoned UGB, great for future development (STCA).
- 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom brick veneer family home.
- 1 bedroom self-contained brick veneer unit.
- Fully operational business with a great return and plenty of room for expansion. 'Casey's Top Catz' cattery is very well renowned within the industry.
- Quality outdoor living & manicured gardens.
- Close proximity to very high performing schools such as Nossal High School and Haileybury/Xavier Colleges.
- 3 phase power and 12.5kw solar system.
- Double car garage and large workshop.
This property is sure to impress and an inspection is a must, but be quick as properties like this one do not come up for sale often!!
EXTRA FEATURES:
• Bedrooms:4
• Bathrooms:3
• Land Size:1.27ha (3.14 acres) (12,707m2) approx
• Outdoor Features
• 7 seat hydrotherapy spa
• Garage Spaces:2

Description:
BRAND NEW COMPLETED HOME! READY TO MOVE INTO NOW!!!!
You will love to come home to this contemporary & luxurious home with its high ceilings, accommodating floor plan and warm and inviting atmosphere. The focal point of this residence is its open plan informal living, dining and kitchen space, which all flow together effortlessly onto the Backyard area. You will not only be investing on this distinguished location, but also a flawless, and pristine design.
The kitchen becomes the masterpiece of the home, a with stainless steel cooktop, oven, dishwasher, stone benchtops and ample storage space for a modern family.
This home is brimming with features, including:
• Four bedrooms, all with built in robes and sizeable enough to make your self feel comfortable
• Master bedroom features a large walk in robe and ensuite with ceaserstone benchtop and shower
• Two separate living areas conveniently positioned around the home include a middle formal living, family room adjacent to kitchen and dining.
• Modern kitchen features a 20mm caesarstone benchtop, 600mm upright cooker and oven, dishwasher
• Zoned ducted heating, and LED downlights throughout
• Remote controlled lock up garage with internal access
• BLINDS , TOWER RAILS , CLOTHESLINE AND MUCH MUCH MORE INCLUDED!!!
Built by the award winning FRANKEN HOMES , this master piece is a rare opportunity to own a piece of the PASEDINA estate , no need to hassle with builders when you can walk right into your very own brand new property, walking distance to all shopping centers and much more
CALL NOW TO BOOK YOUR OWN APPOINTMENT!!
*please note images are for illustration purposes only*

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
ELISTON ESTATE, CLYDE: **MAKE THEM AN OFFER THEY CANNOT REFUSE** Designed and built to a level well and truly beyond that of another spec-built home, the current owners have gone all out in creating a standout property that will seamlessly blend with a busy lifestyle that calls for low maintenance living!
Fronted by landscaped gardens and a beaming contemporary facade complete with touches of brick and render that make it look thoroughly modern and instantly stylish!
Step inside to find crisp white walls that allow for the design to take over and a feature staircase rising towards the feature double height entry complete with a pendant style chandelier. Floating floors immediately grab your attention as they lead you to the open plan lounge/dining area. The gorgeous hostess kitchen offers dark stone benches, 900mm stainless appliances and a walk in pantry.
There's a bonus living area upstairs that makes an ideal kid's retreat along with a study nook that's perfect for the family computer. Each of the 3 bedrooms feature walk in wardrobes, including the ground floor master retreat which offers an impressive ensuite that complements the additional downstairs powder room and gorgeous upstairs bathroom.
Not content yet? Well, don't forget additions such as double glazed windows, LED lighting, 2 split system heater/air conditioners and a 6.0kw solar array with an off-grid storage battery. There is also an automated awning at the rear of the home which will automatically retract in strong winds to protect against weather damage!
Step outside to find a double garage with remote door and internal access as well as an easy to maintain backyard that has been landscaped to require minimal upkeep. With picturesque parkland and playground equipment only approx. 50 metres away, this location offers a great environment for a young or growing family.
Nestled within an expanding development with completed parks and walking tracks there are future plans for a primary school and a town centre, both will be in very close proximity to this property.
Eliston is an estate that is within a short drive to freeway access and all of the amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. You are also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by, whilst the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants. Not to mention the proposed Cranbourne East train station and the existing ones situated right throughout the South East!
This is the perfect opportunity for first timers looking to break into the market, empty nesters and those looking to invest in one of the most popular estates in Clyde!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Lake facing titled land in Hartleigh!
Lake facing titled land is ready to build your dream home in a location your family & friends will envy. - Close to proposed Railway Station
Whether it's a picnic with friends and neighbours or just a quiet, twilight stroll while the kids run around the playground, Hartleigh is about building a new community.
Call Yogi Patel on 0451 719 161 for further details!

Description:
Simply wow
Situated on 448m2 sit this beautiful 25 square (approx.), 5 year old, family home.
Walkthrough the front door into your first of two living rooms – ideal for a large open study, parents retreat or kids game room. Continuing through to your quality, centrally located kitchen offering all the bells and whistles; Miele dishwasher, walk in pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances, 40mm stone benchtops and glass splashback - don't forget the chalkboard pantry door! The master bedroom offers walk-in robe and ensuite with access to the rear garden/8-seater spa, so no going through the home all soaking wet!
Furthermore, the home offers large built in (easy to remove) cat run, double garage with internal access and extremely easy to maintain gardens. Both ducted heating and split system heating/cooling, intercom doorbell and alfresco entertaining.
Features include:
- 448m2 block (approx.)
- 25 square home (approx.)
- Short walk to parks and shops
- Zoned for Willandra Rise P.S
- Outdoor Spa
- Opticomm Fibre
- Blackout blinds throughout
- Built 2013 (5y.o)
Don't miss your chance to buy such a perfect home, call Jared McGovern on 0432 920 029 and avoid missing out.

Description:
FLAWLESS ELEGANCE & LUXURY - BRAND NEW TURN KEY HOME
This charming two-storey, four-bedroom residence located in the exclusive Eliston Estate has all that any first home buyer, investor, down sizer or family would so desire! Impressive facade opens to a world of pure luxury: at the front of the home you will find a cosy living area to relax and watch the latest on Netflix. Walk through to the kitchen, featuring brand new Technika appliances and a stunning stone bench top overlooking family/meals area in an abundance of natural light. Upstairs features an inviting main bedroom with lavishly styled ensuite and impressively large WIR, plus three further bedrooms all with BIRs. Impressed by impeccable style and charm, this low maintenance home is defined by its simple touches, neutral tones and impressive quality. With absolutely minimal garden maintenance required more time can be enjoyed on recreational activities. All about life-style living, enjoying time with family & friends and not being burdened with arduous chores that present themselves with large block sizes! Situated remarkably close to Shopping on Clyde, Clyde Primary, Hillcrest College and public transport options, makes travelling easy yet still enjoy the benefits of a quiet, tranquil environment. Just moments from playgrounds, parks, along with easy access to the freeway - all adding to the recreational and family lifestyle benefits available here. Immerse yourself in the evolving Clyde community, an opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Three Acres in the Urban Growth Zone
Often sought but rarely found is this outstanding opportunity to secure three acres of prime land which is already included in the Urban Growth Zone. This land is due to become part of the Clyde South Precinct Structure Plan and has been marked as potential future residential development. Currently the flat three acres site hosts a sizeable home featuring four bedrooms, an independent office with external access, two bathrooms and generous living areas. The land itself contains generous shedding and stables for keeping dogs and horses representing further value to potential residents. Capitalise on an opportunity to make your mark on the future of the City of Casey. Don't miss out on one of the rarest and most exciting opportunities on the market today!

Location and style!!!!!!
Showcasing the stunning character of a modern home, packed with all the conveniences of today, this open plan residence with magnificent street appeal sits in an enviable location.
Offering a great floor plan, complimented by a modern colour palette living is made easy.
Some features of this home are:
• Open plan kitchen/Family/Dining
• Stainless steel appliances/ Range hood / Dishwasher
• Walk in Pantry
• Ducted heating
• Evaporative cooling
• Double lock up garage with remote & Internal access
• High Ceilings
• LED Down-lights
• Extra wide entrance
Close proximity to all amenities, Clyde shopping center, Casey Race, Clyde primary school & Casey fields sports complex just to name a few.
Call us today for more info!!!!!!!

Description:
Striking 10 month old Burbank beauty
Located in the tranquil Belmond on Clyde estate, we are proud to introduce this quality built Burbank home. Sure to impress the most particular of buyers, the functional floorplan boasts two separate living zones, a beautiful hostess kitchen and to top it off a fantastic entertainers area outside!
Features include:
- Generous Master suite with a large walk in robe plus ensuite featuring twin vanities.
- Three more spacious bedrooms – two with walk in robes and the third includes built in robes.
- Large open plan family living area with central kitchen and dining space.
- Stunning kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, walk in pantry, 900mm oven with five burner gas cooktop, waterfall stone benchtops with breakfast bar and plenty of cupboard space.
- Separate formal living area.
- Large decked entertainer's area overlooking a generous backyard for kids and pets to play.
- Double remote garage with internal access.
- Other features include ducted heating and downlights throughout, high ceilings, upgraded quality fittings to both the kitchen and showers, landscaped gardens back and front, and much, much more.
On top of the great features, contemporary design & street appeal this home offers, you'll also love all the abundance of facilities at your fingertips. Belmond is situated in the heart of the fastest growing suburb of Clyde and is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. Lush parks and open spaces make family time a breeze plus there is easy access to Shopping on Clyde, schools such as Clyde Primary, sports and recreation facilities– it's got it all!
To ensure you don't miss out on this amazing opportunity please make sure you contact us to organize an inspection!
